text: The 2001–02 LEN Cup is the ongoing 10th edition of LEN's third-tier competition for men's water polo clubs. ==Qualifying rounds== ===Qualification round II=== *23–25 November Group winners and runners-up teams of each group advance to quarter finals. {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- !Key to colours in group tables |- style="background:#cfc;" |Group winners and runners-up advance to quarter finals |} ====Group E==== Catalunya has the right to organize the tournament. ====Group F==== Leonessa has the right to organize the tournament. ====Group G==== POŠK has the right to organize the tournament. ====Group H==== Rote Erde Hamm has the right to organize the tournament. == Knockout stage == ===Quarter-finals=== The first legs were played on 19 and 20 January, and the second legs were played on 2 and 3 February 2002. ===Semi- finals=== The first legs were played on 23 and 24 February, and the second legs were played on 9 and 10 March 2002. ===Finals=== The first legs was played on 23 March, and the second legs was played on 13 April 2002. ==See also== *2001–02 LEN Champions League *2001–02 LEN Cup Winners' Cup Category:2001 in water polo Category:2002 in water polo
title: 2001–02 LEN Cup
